name: notifymemcp
description: An MCP server that sends notifications via ntfy.sh when your LLM finishes generating tokens. Perfect for long-running LLM tasks where you want to be notified when completion happens. Provides a send_notification tool with customizable messages, titles, priorities, and tags. Requires a notifyMeMCPconfig.json file with your ntfy server URL (see config.example.json). Silent on success, alerts LLM only on errors.
